creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: kimono with cream ground and red-orange lining, with padded hem; decorated with net-like flowers in brown; black ink outlines of scrolling stems, buds and flowers; some solid black flowers with metallic gold details; orange silk embroidered flowers and buds; some gold detailing on stems and on some flowers; some green embroidered stems; large bold characters on each sleeve and chest at upper PR and on upper body on back
marks: in embroidery, in orange and gold: (Plum blossoms
title: Kosode with plum trees and Chinese poem by Zhang Xiaobiao
